attributes.action: remove prescription charges for people with Cystic Fibrosis and make it easier to apply for benefits, carers support and holiday Insurance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please make it easier for people with CF to get fianicial support to live a relatively normal life, as daily treatment can make it difficult to hold down a job. Can this government make insurance companies help peolpe and their families with CF, get holiday insurance so they can get the long earned breaks they need.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
